title: How can I avoid Customs/Reduce
selftext: I'm planning to buy Hacksmith's Mini Lightsaber([https://hacksmith.store/en-in/products/pre-order-mini-saber-gen-2?variant=43797932015831](https://hacksmith.store/en-in/products/pre-order-mini-saber-gen-2?variant=43797932015831)) which costs around 7000INR, With Duties and Taxes it estimates around 110 usd which is 9000INR. Of course I do not wish to pay 9000 extra rupees so, is there a way to possibly reduce tax or perhaps completely avoid.
comments: If you know somebody ask them to get it in their baggage if possible. Free allowance of upto 50,000
Do you *know a guy who knows a guy who knows another guy*?

There’s some websites which help you get stuff from other countries (more from US, UK, Canada, Australia), by adding the item into a traveller’s luggage. Maybe try that?
PS: I’ve never tried it, just seen some sites.

Also, I’d say wait until any friend of your’s is coming to India and ask them to get it.
i’ve never heard of sites like this, can you link some of those sites you’ve come across
